# Ecommerce Starter V2

> A universal, production-ready Next.js e-commerce starter kit.

## Project Overview
This project is a modern e-commerce platform built with:
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Authentication**: Clerk
- **Payments**: Stripe (Elements & Webhooks)
- **Shipping**: Shippo
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Internationalization**: next-intl (FR/EN)

## Site Structure

### Core Pages
- [Home Page](/en) - Main landing page.
- [Shop](/en/shop) - Product catalog with filtering and pagination.
- [Cart](/en/cart) - Shopping cart.
- [Contact](/en/contact) - Contact form and information.

### Dynamic Routes
- Products: `/en/product/[slug]` (e.g., `/en/product/premium-planter-box`)
- Categories: `/en/shop?category=[slug]`

### Administration
- [Admin Dashboard](/en/admin) - Order and product management (Restricted).

## Key Features for AI Understanding
- **Structured Data**: Product pages include JSON-LD (Schema.org/Product).
- **Sitemap**: Available at `/sitemap.xml`.
- **Localization**: Content is available in French (`/fr`) and English (`/en`).

For technical details on the architecture and setup, refer to the source code repository or the `/docs` directory if available publicly.
